name: Touken Ranbu Warriors
overview: A secret Sengoku Era drama begins now. "Touken Ranbu Warriors" is an action game that is a collaboration between the "spirits of blades" simulation game "Touken Ranbu ONLINE", and the "1 vs. 1,000" warriors series of Koei Tecmo. The Touken Danshi, 15 blades incarnate who had been drifting aimlessly without a Saniwa master, are suddenly attacked by the History Retrograde Army. After the battle, they are assigned by the Government of Time to undertake "onslaught investigations." The masterless blades have no choice but to depart for the chaotic world of the Sengoku Era, whose history had already begun to be altered.
